security: This document contains personal financial information, specifically the mortgage amount ($167,429.88) and property address (163 East 71st Street, New York, New York), which could be exploited for fraudulent activities or identity theft if disclosed.
summary: A mortgage document dated March 2, 1978, between a husband and wife in New York and ROUSH-WALKER Company, securing a debt of $167,429.88 against a property located at 163 East 71st Street, New York, New York.
summary_one_paragraph: This mortgage document, dated March 2, 1978, outlines an agreement between a New York husband and wife and ROUSH-WALKER Company, where the mortgagors secure a debt of $167,429.88 with a property located at 163 East 71st Street, New York, New York. The property is described in detail, including its location on the northerly side of 71st Street, 285 feet westerly from Third Avenue, and its dimensions relative to the center line of the block and adjacent party walls.
title: Mortgage Document
